クラス HttpResponseGetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.ac.u_tokyo.kyoyo.seo.nicoapilib.HttpResponseGetter
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    NicoListEditor, NicoLogin, NicoRanking, NicoSearch

    public class HttpResponseGetter
extends java.lang.Object
    HTTP通信の実装クラス
    This class defines the logic of http communication.

    reference;

    • メソッドの詳細

      • tryPost

        public boolean tryPost(java.lang.String path,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        apacheでpostしてクッキーとレスポンスを取得
        Posts in apache and gets Cookie and response.
        パラメータ:
        path - target url, cannot be null
        params - map of name and param, corresponding to List of NameValuePair passed to HttpPost#setEntity
        戻り値:
        Returns true if success. Be sure to check this value before getting response or cookieStore.

      • tryPost

                       org.apache.http.client.CookieStore cookieStore)

        public boolean tryGet(java.lang.String path)
        引数簡略したもの
        The method with omitted argument.
        パラメータ:
        path - target url, cannot be null
        戻り値:
        the same

      • tryGet

        public boolean tryGet(java.lang.String path,
                      org.apache.http.client.CookieStore cookieStore)
        apacheでgetしてクッキーとレスポンスを取得
        Gets in apache and catches response.
        パラメータ:
        path - target url, cannot be null
        cookieStore - cookies needed for access, can be null
        戻り値:
        Returns true if success. Be sure to check this value before getting response
